Sodelavcem poskušamo čim bolj prisluhniti
05 Nov 2019, 10:07 by Oglasno Sporočilo

Dober delodajalec zna prisluhniti svojim sodelavcem in jim po najboljših močeh omogočiti pogoje za zadovoljstvo na delovnem mestu.



Valentina Marić, prodajalka; Hazim Ramić, poslovodja in Lucija Hauptman, namestnica poslovodje “Všeč nam je, da podjetje spodbuja samostojnost.”  

Vsak zaposleni je del mozaika podjetja, zato je za končno sliko pomembno zadovoljstvo prav vsakega od njih. Pogovor gradi zaupanje, zaupanje gradi odnos. Včasih je dovolj že prijazna beseda ali usmeritev. A pred tem je treba poskrbeti za temelje zadovoljstva, kot so nadpovprečno plačilo v trgovinski panogi, prilagodljivi zaposlitveni modeli in takojšnja zaposlitev za nedoločen čas.

“V podjetju spodbujajo mojo samostojnost.”

Lucija Hauptman, namestnica poslovodje
V podjetju HOFER redno izvajajo interno raziskavo zadovoljstva med sodelavci. Zadnja je na primer pokazala, da se 86 % sodelavcev v podjetju HOFER močno strinja, da podjetje spodbuja samostojno delo in delo na lastno pobudo.
Zaposleni povedo svoje mnenje, ko verjamejo, da bo upoštevano.
“Redno izvajamo interno raziskavo o zadovoljstvu med našimi sodelavci. Poleg tega skrbimo, da se sodelavci pogovarjajo in med seboj podajajo enostavna in jasna navodila za delo. Le tako lahko zagotovimo, da vsak natančno ve, kakšna je njegova vloga v podjetju,” je razložila Petra Štrukelj, vodja HR pri podjetju HOFER.
A delodajalec mora najprej poskrbeti za trdne temelje in zadovoljstvo svojih sodelavcev na delovnem mestu. V primeru podjetja HOFER so to takojšnja zaposlitev za nedoločen čas, nadpovprečno plačilo v trgovinski panogi in prilagodljivi zaposlitveni modeli.
Pridružite se HOFERjevi ekipi
Vsi, ki iščete novo priložnost in si želite postati del HOFERjeve ekipe, lahko preverite HOFER ugodnosti in prosta delovna mesta na karierni spletni strani kariera.hofer.si.

We try to listen to our colleagues as much as possible
05 Nov 2019, 10:07 by Announcement Message

A good employer can listen to their employees and give them the best possible conditions for job satisfaction.



Valentina Maric, saleswoman; Hazim Ramić, Executive Director and Lucija Hauptman, Deputy Executive Director "We like the company to promote independence."

Each employee is part of the mosaic of the company, so the satisfaction of each is important for the final image. Conversation builds trust, trust builds relationship. Sometimes a kind word or direction is enough. But before that, the basics of satisfaction, such as above-average pay in the trade industry, flexible employment models and immediate permanent employment, must be taken care of.

"The company promotes my independence."

Lucia Hauptman, Deputy Manager
HOFER regularly conducts internal employee satisfaction surveys. The latter, for example, showed that 86% of HOFER associates strongly agree that the company promotes self-employment and self-employment.
Employees express their opinions when they believe it will be taken into account.
“We regularly conduct an internal survey of satisfaction among our colleagues. In addition, we ensure that colleagues talk and give each other simple and clear instructions for work. Only in this way can we ensure that everyone knows exactly what his role is in the company, ”explained Petra Štrukelj, HR Manager at HOFER.
However, the employer must first ensure the solid foundations and satisfaction of its employees in the workplace. In the case of HOFER, these are immediate permanent employment, above-average pay in the trade and flexible employment models.
